document.full_text: the national labor relations board says in a complaint that the company chose south carolina for its new 787 dreamliner production line in retaliation against a union, which is illegal.
document.title: labor board tells boeing new factory breaks law
lines_and_colors: the national labor relations board says in a complaint that the company chose south carolina for its new 787 dreamliner production line in retaliation against a union, which is illegal.
